titles.title: A bill to authorize the Rumsey Indian Rancheria to convey a certain parcel of land.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Rumsey Indian Rancheria in California to convey certain land in Sparks, Nevada, to any bona fide purchaser for value. Directs that proceeds from the conveyance of such land may be used only for the economic development and social welfare of the Rumsey Indian Rancheria.
